tool_description: Tracks and analyzes portfolio allocations across sectors, geographies, market caps, and other asset classifications for allocation analysis.

asset_symbols.description: Array of asset ticker symbols in the portfolio

portfolio_weights.description: Array of portfolio weights corresponding to each asset

classification_type.description: Type of classification: sector, geography, market_cap, asset_class

error_messages: Array length mismatch: asset_symbols and portfolio_weights must have the same length.
Weight validation error: Portfolio weights must sum to approximately 1.0 (Â±0.01).
Invalid classification type: Use sector, geography, market_cap, or asset_class.
Asset classification error: Unable to classify one or more assets. Verify ticker symbols are valid.
usage: Provide asset symbols and their weights to analyze portfolio allocation by specified classification. The tool returns breakdown by categories and concentration metrics.

category_names.description: Array of category names found in portfolio

category_weights.description: Array of weights by category (same order as category_names)

largest_allocation.description: Name of category with largest allocation

allocation_count.description: Number of distinct categories in portfolio
